import React from 'react'; import "./About.css"; import AboutImg from "../assets/about.jpg"; import CV from "../assets/Soniya-Cv.pdf" import Info from "./Info.js" const About = () => { return (

About Me

My introduction

Frontend developer, I create web pages with UI / UX user interface, I have years of experience and many clients are happy with the projects carried out.

Download CV
) } export default About
